name: Backstage Pass
description: VIP Access to Justin's world. View video Dedications without spending Stars to send them!

name: Concert Tickets
description: Two front row tickets to the show! Unlocks Arcade gameplay for the next level up!

name: Glasses
description: Justin's swanky purple shades enable you to see special hints and targets in the Arcade games!

name: Lock of Hair
description: Priceless for the true Bieber fan! "Grows back" & refreshes your Star balance +50 daily!!

name: Pants
description: Use these duds to outfit Justin in the Arcade. Winning a Challenge with these pants awards x3 points, so send your custom game to Friends!

name: Shoes
description: These killer kicks allow you to speed up gameplay in the Arcade for extra bonus points! Make Justin dance faster and jump higher!
